Family.ru: Двоюродные братья и сёстры играют вместе.

Family.en: My father works in an office.
We visit our grandparents on weekends.
Family.uz: Biz dam olish kunlarida bobolarimizga boramiz.
Family.ru: Мы навещаем бабушку и дедушку по выходным.

Family.en: I call my parents every day.
Family.uz: Men har kuni ota-onamga qo'ng'iroq qilaman.

Family.en: We live in a small house.
My cousin lives in another city.
Family.ru: Мой двоюродный брат живёт в другом городе.

Family.en: I help my mother with cooking.
Family.uz: Men onamga ovqat pishirishda yordam beraman.

Family.en: We watch TV together in the evening.
Family.uz: Biz kechqurun televizorni birga tomosha qilamiz.

Food.en: I drink coffee in the morning.
The restaurant is famous for its kebabs.

Weather.en: We had a lot of snow last winter.
Weather.uz: O'tgan qish ko'p qor yog'gan edi.

Travel.en: We are planning a trip to Samarkand.
I want to see the world.
He likes to try new food.
Travel.uz: U yangi ovqatlarni tatib ko'rishni yoqtiradi.

Travel.en: I will send you a postcard.
They are going on vacation tomorrow.
I enjoy learning about new cultures.
Travel.uz: Men yangi madaniyatlar haqida o'rganishni yoqtiraman.
Travel.ru: Мне нравится узнавать о новых культурах.

Work.en: I go to work every day.
Work.ru: Я хожу на работу каждый день.

Work.en: I use a computer at work.

Work.ru: Я езжу на работу на автобусе.

Work.en: I go to work at 9 AM.
Work.ru: Я иду на работу в 9 утра.

Work.en: I need to finish this report.
I'm looking for a new job.
I work with a great team.
My office is in the city center.
I have a business trip next week.
Work.uz: Mening kelasi hafta ish safari bor.
Work.ru: У меня командировка на следующей неделе.

Work.uz: U kun bo'yi elektron pochta xabarlariga javob beradi.
Work.ru: Она весь день отвечает на электронные письма.

Hobbies.uz: Biz dam olish kunlarida piyoda sayr qilamiz.
Hobbies.ru: Мы ходим в походы по выходным.

Hobbies.en: We play chess in the evening.
He writes poems in his free time.
Hobbies.ru: Он пишет стихи в свободное время.

Health.en: We need to see a doctor.
I try to eat healthy food.
Health.uz: Men sog'lom ovqat yeyishga harakat qilaman.

Shopping.ru: Я хожу за покупками по выходным.

Shopping.uz: Men har hafta xarid qilishga boraman.
Shopping.ru: Я хожу за покупками каждую неделю.

Shopping.en: We need to go to the supermarket.
He is looking for a gift.
She is paying at the cashier.

Shopping.ru: Он любит ходить по магазинам (смотреть витрины).

Shopping.en: We are looking for a toy for our son.
Shopping.ru: Мы ищем игрушку для нашего сына.

Directions.en: The bank is on the right.
The park is across the road.
The station is two blocks away.

Animals.en: We saw a lion at the zoo.
They are watching a documentary about animals.
Animals.uz: Ular hayvonlar haqidagi hujjatli filmini tomosha qilishyaptilar.
Animals.ru: Они смотрят документальный фильм о животных.

Nature.en: She enjoys walking in the park.
He likes to watch the sunset.
Nature.uz: U quyosh botishini tomosha qilishni yoqtiradi.

Nature.en: He took a photo of the landscape.
We went camping in the valley.
Nature.ru: Мы ходили в поход в долине.

Nature.en: I listen to the sounds of nature.
He is studying animals in the wild.
Nature.ru: Он изучает животных в дикой природе.

Sports.uz: Men har kuni ertalab yugurishga chiqaman.

Sports.en: We play volleyball on the beach.
Sports.ru: Мы играем в волейбол на пляже.

Sports.en: She is training for the competition.

Sports.uz: Men yangi yugurish poyabzallarini sotib oldim.

Sports.en: They are fans of that team.

Music.en: We went to a concert last night.
Music.ru: Мы ходили на концерт прошлой ночью.

Movies.en: We are going to the cinema tonight.
Movies.ru: Мы идём в кино сегодня вечером.

Movies.en: They are filming a movie here.
Movies.uz: Ular bu yerda film suratga olmoqdalar.

Books.en: We discussed the book in class.
I borrowed a book from the library.
She gave me a book as a gift.
Books.uz: U menga sovg'a sifatida kitob berdi.
Books.ru: Она дала мне книгу в подарок.

Technology.en: She uses a laptop for work.
She is always on her phone.
We live in a digital world.
She posted a picture on Instagram.
I will send you an email.
This robot can clean the house.

History.en: She is reading a history book.
They are learning about ancient civilizations.
He knows a lot about world history.
History.uz: U jahon tarixi haqida ko'p biladi.
History.ru: Он много знает о всемирной истории.

History.en: They are digging for archaeological finds.
History.ru: Они копают в поисках археологических находок.

History.en: History helps us understand the present.
History.uz: Tarix hozirgi zamonni tushunishga yordam beradi.

History.en: She wrote an essay about the Silk Road.
History.uz: U Buyuk Ipak Yo'li haqida insho yozdi.
History.ru: Она написала эссе о Шёлковом пути.

History.en: He is interested in military history.
We discussed the events of the past.

Science.en: We learned about gravity in science class.
Science.uz: Biz fan darsida gravitatsiya haqida o'rgandik.
Science.ru: Мы узнали о гравитации на уроке науки.

Science.en: They are researching a new medicine.
He is writing a research paper.

Art.en: We have art class on Friday.
Art.uz: Juma kuni bizning san'at darsimiz bor.
Art.ru: У нас урок искусства в пятницу.

Art.en: She is taking a photography course.
We are going to the theater.

Holidays.en: He visits his family during holidays.
Holidays.ru: Он навещает свою семью во время праздников.

Holidays.en: She cooks special food for holidays.
Holidays.uz: U bayramlar uchun maxsus ovqat pishiradi.
Holidays.ru: Она готовит специальную еду на праздники.

Holidays.en: He is excited for the holiday.
They are preparing for the celebration.
The streets are decorated during holidays.
She sends holiday cards to friends.
Holidays.uz: U do'stlariga bayramlik ochiq esdalik yuboradi.

Holidays.en: We remember our traditions during holidays.
Holidays.ru: Мы помним наши традиции во время праздников.

Holidays.en: They are watching a holiday movie.

Emotions.en: They are proud of their son.

Daily Routine.en: I go to work at 8 AM.
Daily Routine.ru: Я иду на работу в 8 утра.

Daily Routine.en: She checks her email in the morning.
We watch TV in the evening.
I read a book before sleep.
She goes to bed at 11 PM.

Daily Routine.uz: U har kuni ertalab mashq qiladi.

Daily Routine.en: We clean the house on Saturdays.
I often take a nap in the afternoon.
Daily Routine.uz: Men ko'pincha tushdan keyin bir oz uxlayman.

Daily Routine.en: She cooks dinner for the family.
Daily Routine.uz: U oila uchun kechki ovqat pishiradi.

Daily Routine.en: He walks the dog every day.
Daily Routine.uz: U har kuni itni olib chiqib yuradi.
Daily Routine.ru: Он гуляет с собакой каждый день.

Friends.en: They have been friends since childhood.
We go out with friends on weekends.
Friends.uz: Biz dam olish kunlarida do'stlar bilan chiqamiz.
Friends.ru: Мы гуляем с друзьями по выходным.

Friends.en: I made a new friend at school.
Friends.ru: Я завёл нового друга в школе.

Friends.en: They are planning a trip together.
She invited her friends to the party.

Home.en: He is sitting in the living room.
We are moving to a new home.

Home.uz: Men uyda o'zimni xavfsiz his qilaman.
Home.ru: Я чувствую себя в безопасности дома.

Home.en: We have a big family photo in the hall.
Home.uz: Bizning zalda katta oilaviy fotosurat bor.
Home.ru: У нас в зале большая семейная фотография.

Home.en: He is sleeping in his bedroom.

Culture.en: This dance is part of our culture.
Culture.uz: Bu raqs bizning madaniyatimizning bir qismi.

Culture.en: I enjoy learning about Uzbek culture.
Culture.uz: Men o'zbek madaniyati haqida o'rganishni yoqtiraman.

Culture.en: The food is part of the culture.
He wrote a book about culture.

Geography.en: I want to travel around the world.
Geography.uz: Men butun dunyo bo'ylab sayohat qilmoqchiman.
Geography.ru: Я хочу путешествовать по всему миру.

Geography.en: He is looking at the globe.
The country has a diverse landscape.

Languages.en: I want to improve my pronunciation.
They are watching a movie in English.
Languages.uz: Ular ingliz tilidagi filmni tomosha qilishyaptilar.

Dreams.en: She dreams of traveling the world.
Dreams.uz: U butun dunyoni kezishni orzu qiladi.

Dreams.en: He wants to be a doctor.
I hope my dream comes true.
Dreams.uz: Men orzum amalga oshishiga umid qilaman.

Dreams.en: He is working towards his dream.

Future Plans.en: He is going to start a business.
We plan to buy a house.
They are saving money for the future.

Future Plans.uz: Men Yaponiyaga tashrif buyurishga umid qilaman.

Future Plans.en: He is thinking about his career.
We are planning a trip for next year.
Future Plans.ru: Мы планируем поездку на следующий год.

Future Plans.en: I am learning new skills for my future.
Future Plans.uz: Men kelajagim uchun yangi ko'nikmalarni o'rganyapman.
Future Plans.ru: Я учу новые навыки для своего будущего.

Future Plans.en: She is preparing for her future job.
Future Plans.ru: Она готовится к своей будущей работе.

Future Plans.en: He has a clear plan for the future.
Future Plans.uz: Uning kelajak uchun aniq rejasi bor.
Future Plans.ru: У него есть чёткий план на будущее.

Future Plans.en: We dream about our future together.
Future Plans.uz: Biz kelajagimiz haqida birga orzu qilamiz.
Future Plans.ru: Мы мечтаем о нашем будущем вместе.

Future Plans.en: They are investing in their future.
I am optimistic about the future.

Education.uz: Men har kuni ingliz tilini o'rganaman.

Education.en: The teacher explained the lesson well.
We have an exam on Monday.
The school has a big library.
Education is the key to success.
We are doing a science project.
I want to learn how to code.
She is reading a book for her course.
Education.uz: U o'z kursi uchun kitob o'qiyapti.
Education.ru: Она читает книгу для своего курса.
Мы практикуем разговорную речь на уроке.

Education.en: He asked a question to the professor.
